changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery), count_series AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS quantity FROM series) INSERT INTO trainings (start_date_at_utc, end_date_at_utc, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc, device_id, training_type_id) SELECT NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 700) + 700)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (700 - 699) + 699)) * INTERVAL '1 hour', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (700 - 550) + 550)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (550 - 498) + 498)) * INTERVAL '1 day', FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1), FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1) FROM series s, count_series cs
